text: Raimon Carrasco Azemar (17 February 1924 – 20 March 2022) was a Spanish businessman and football executive. He was the 1st president of FC Barcelona from 1977 until 1978. He was born in Barcelona, Spain. Carrasco died on 20 March 2022 in Barcelona, at the age of 98.Mor l'expresident Raimon Carrasco ==References== ==Other websites== * Notícia a El País sobre la implicación de Raimon Carrasco en el Caso Banca Catalana (Spanish) * Raimon Carrasco at FC Barcelona.com Category:1924 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Spanish businesspeople Category:Sportspeople from Barcelona
title: Raimon Carrasco
